website_summaries.verdict: Butcher block that's thick and durable, and also looks good enough to serve from.
pros: Thickness level of almost 2-inches for no chance of warping over time
Acacia wood looks great and is eco-friendly
Inner handles so you can carry the block safely and steadily
cons: Sometimes this type of wood may develop cracks or splits over time

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood block. Oiled it up overnight, but noticed a small crack in it. Hopefully won't be an issue, but did contact manufacturer, and he was very reasonable. He offered to exchange the board, but I countered that it's a really nice block, and if the small crack doesn't increase, it won't be a problem, but if the crack grows, I would want to exchange. He said no problem, use the board and if it gets any worse, contact him for an exchange. Customer satisfaction a big priority. Did I mention it is a lovely block.
customer_reviews.author: S. Muhle

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully hand crafted butcher block
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Hardwood Chef butcher block cutting board. If you are looking for a fine crafted unique butcher block "this is for you!" The design, quality and feel of the wood is so impressive. I love the fact that is has two openings on the sides to carry as you entertain your guests also. Great gift for a bridal shower, newlyweds or any occasion. Professionally packaged for the perfect gift, or for yourself!! I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my wife and she was thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally not a fan of purchasing a product with very few reviews but I took a chance and purchased the cutting board based on what others have written about the product. Well... I'm sure glad I did! The product was delivered delicately and packaged with care and elegance. What I loved about the board is that it can be used for multipurposes other than a cutting board. I especially love the carrying handles and deep juice groove feature. Overall, I am very satisfied with the product and will purchase other products from Hardwood Chef.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this butcher block! It was nicely packaged, which is great if you are considering giving this as a gift, perfect for a housewarming or wedding. It also comes with care instructions, which I appreciate. The craftsmanship is impeccable. The built-in handles are a thoughtful touch. This product can be used for multiple purposes...cutting board, serving platter, etc. I will be proudly displaying this in my kitchen when not in use. I plan to purchase this product several times over to give as gifts! UPDATE: Been using the board for a few weeks now and it's absolutely gorgeous... it takes cuts and scratches so well and you can tell the quality is supurb.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This cutting board is very aesthetically pleasing and makes the perfect center piece on my kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: PROS Pictures don’t do it justice. This cutting board is very aesthetically pleasing and makes the perfect center piece on my kitchen island. Have received compliments by most who have seen our kitchen since. Even our refrigerator handyman took a liking to it. Wood is very smooth and chic with a decent sized groove for catching juices. Great for a wine and cheese night by the fireplace curled up with a book. CONS There really aren’t any. I’ve cooked significantly more than I used to since getting this board. Thank you hardwood chef for getting me to step up my game in the kitchen. Husband is very pleased with all the food I’ve been making him.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Good block and also a handy size.
customer_reviews.text: The block I received is in good shape with good joints and finish. I rubbed it down with mineral oil several times and have used it daily to chop/cut vegetables, cheese and other foods to cook. No problems with grooves from cutting and seems to heal well. Have a used a variety of knives for different foods and got good results. It did seem to slide around so I put a non-stick pad under it which helps keep it in place. Cleans up well and another plus is that mine also looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Warren E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now and am delighted with it. It is solid and beautiful and easy on my knives. I oiled it early and often and it looks like new. Its thickness keeps it from sliding around the counter. There are no signs of any potential splitting. This is the cutting board you have been lookinf for!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid cutting block with deep handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid cutting block with deep handles. This will definitely not slip out of my hands. Always looks better with a brisket on it! I'm looking forward for my next bbq event!!
customer_reviews.author: Mortl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship! This board is so beautiful I keep it out on my counter 24/7. It’s sturdy and very reasonably priced. I will probably purchase another one to give as a Christmas gift. I highly recommend this cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: GLenn

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within first week!
customer_reviews.text: Hoping the seller receives this review as I’m quite dissatisfied with the purchase as it has been less than 10 days after receiving and there is already a large crack/split in the board. See pictures. The split is growing and I can see another one forming in the opposite corner. I’ve barely washed the board and when I have it’s always been hand washed with only water. Very disappointing quality and would like a replacement or refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: it was also warped on arrival such that it spun easily on a flat table
customer_reviews.text: cracked in barely a month of use after very very deliberately oiling and hand drying compulsively. it was also warped on arrival such that it spun easily on a flat table. I should have just sent it back but I was tired of searching for a board so i went ahead. Very disappointed, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: claire cloque

customer_reviews.title: I spend a lot of money on each block and were purchased at stores like Macys, Bed Bath and Beyond etc
customer_reviews.text: I been a homeowner and chef for over thirty years and had used all kinds of butcher blocks. I spend a lot of money on each block and were purchased at stores like Macys, Bed Bath and Beyond etc. I have to say that this one that I just purchased (Hardwood Chef) is outstanding. I love the wood and features. Much better that the ones I had in the past. I'm going to let all my friends and family know about this product and how great it is. From 1 to 10, 10 being the greatest, I rate this product a ten. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I just managed to get back to living on my own after a long illness and layoff, and this cutting board is my housewarming gift to myself. It is lovely - the colors are rich and elegant and it looks a great deal more expensive than the purchase price. I'm on a renal diet which is pretty limited, but this cutting board makes me excited to set up my kitchen and cook for myself. Thank you for making such a beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: grapefruithoneybee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Improved handle design. Easier to tell which way is up and the handle no longer collects water during wash. Don't forget to apply oil and cream to protect it. My wife and I love this butcher's block!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best High-End Cutting Board Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Upon opening the box, I almost didn't want to remove the gift-like wrapping as my hardwood cutting board was so elegantly packaged. Once unveiled, my cutting board is truly a work of art to behold! I immediately began using my new friend the night that I received it and my guests all raved about it's quality appearance. I love the different wood grains and the actual thickness of the cutting board. I have had many cutting boards over the years but this one is truly exceptional. I am going to buy several more and use them as gifts! Thanks so much Hardwood Chef.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Treglia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful butcher block
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful find! I received my butcher block and absolutely fell in love with it. It is made very well and looks very high end. Customer service is wonderful. I was shopping around for a while and I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: This board arrived in a beautiful luxurious box and upon opening it
customer_reviews.text: Ok... This board arrived in a beautiful luxurious box and upon opening it, was wrapped in crisp kitchen paper AND tied with thin white kitchen twine... A super presentation !! This was a great prelude to seeing the rich, heavyweight board contained inside. The cutting/serving board has comfortable groves at the ends as handles and a nice groove all the way around to catch juices while carving. The color of the wood is rich and dark. I gave this as a gift and was so proud as my sister opened it !! I may even order one for myself. Well worth the money... I'm looking forward to having my very own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be the perfect size for use as a charcuterie board and may ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the board as a gift. It arrived in just a couple of days, was very well wrapped, and is a very substantial piece. It seems to be the perfect size for use as a charcuterie board and may be too “pretty” to use as a carving board. I predict many years of use by the recipients. The e-book is an excellent addition to the board.
customer_reviews.author: Debo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I am thrilled with my new butcher block. It is functional and attractive - I can use it as a cutting board or for presentation. It is sturdy, attractive, and best of all - sustainable! Also, it makes a great wedding or housewarming gift. Very happy with it and know it'll be a kitchen staple!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend mentioned to me how much he loved this as a gift so I bought this cutting board for my husbands birthday. It comes with a really nice gift wrap and my husband and I both love using it. It’s solid and the coloring of the wood is really nice. Glad I made this purchase as I know this gift will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Nivison

customer_reviews.title: This is the board to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship is good. I found a couple of slightly rough spots, but took special care to condition these while conditioning all sides and hand holds. The size and height make it easy to carry to the grill work with on the counter. We expect to get many years from this product. Thank you Jonathan!
customer_reviews.author: DDF

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied in Seattle
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class cutting board. It is very well constructed. It is priced very reasonably for the quality of the materials, craftsmanship and the efficiency of the delivery. It arrived in great condition and on time. I liked it so much that I bought a second one to give as a house warming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in original order but Company was quick to replace
customer_reviews.text: The board curved severely shortly after the return window closed on this item. We had a friend who does woodworking help us straighten it back out. It was fine for a while and then it curved again before getting a big split. We are going to have to trash it and find a different one. The company replaced the board and so far the new is holding up better than the original one.
customer_reviews.author: april w

customer_reviews.title: Best Cutting Board by far
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, gorgeous, classy, functional,stylish,worth the price, get one immediately or regret you bought the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We love this cutting board. I love that it has two sides, one with a juice tray and one without. There are also handle grooves on either side which makes it very easy to carry to another location if you're hosting & using as a meat and cheese board, etc. ;) It even comes wrapped like a gift (which it was). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cloo

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this product that I encouraged anyone who needs ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't rate things, but I am making an exception to my rule. I am so pleased with this product that I encouraged anyone who needs or wants a new cutting board to purchase one of these. I have been using my Hardwood Chef cutting board going on 3 months now, and it has quickly become one of my favorite kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: William McDermitt

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Wow it was far better then expected. From the first it proved to be exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Grodnicki

customer_reviews.title: Cracks and separates at the joints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months back. Never put it through the dishwasher and treated it great but the joints still cracked and separated. Looks great but not worth the price tag to need to replace after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Designed Wooden Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Hardwood Chef cutting board and it came beautifully packaged. LOVE it ! Its such a nice decorative piece on the counter but also works well for food prep. The different wood patterns are also a great touch. It is not too heavy to store in my cabinet after each use which was a concern. The board is flat and doesn't move around on my counter top while in use. The finger gripes and groove makes this board truly unique. Looking forward to many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: I thought this cutting board was high quality and it's not. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This item cracked in 7 months. Totally disappointed after spending $80.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Stable on marble counters.
customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful wood. No wonder Elohim told Moses to use this would to build the Ark of the Covenant. Light but hard.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to tie kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! My kitchen is the pride and joy of my house and anyone who enjoys cooking and/or entertaining should have this in theirs. It is functional and elegant; cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Camber governski

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great caring company, The product is of the highest quality and attention to detail. When the gift recipient opened it there was a "oooh" filling the room followed by a "wow that is so beautiful"
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart and warps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this three years ago. A piece by the handle fell off within a year, but wasn't a big deal. Now the board has started warping. I have wooden cutting boards that are older and cheaper that managed to stay in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: A fine hand crafted artisan butcher block
customer_reviews.text: A fine hand crafted artisan butcher block with very unique colored wood, a fine compliment to anyone's decor! It was packaged very tastefully, making it a nice gift to send through the mail!
customer_reviews.author: David Guerin

customer_reviews.title: but it stained easily and cracked in two places plus I was unable ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing; cracked within two weeks of having this board. I cleaned it, oiled it, but it stained easily and cracked in two places plus I was unable to remove odors such as onions after chopping. A disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SWY

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my cutting board in just a couple of days and it was wrapped beautifully. Not only was it a dream to prepare food on, when I used it to serve apps to my guests, I received raving comments about this product. The quality and workmanship of a Hardwood Chef cutting board bring elegance and class to an evening with friends. For those looking to make a statement in their kitchen, I highly recommend this top of the line cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutting board. I don’t normally write reviews, but I can’t stop getting compliments on this product! It’s incredible to have when we have friends over serving appetizers before dinner. Wish they had larger sizes though.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best cutting board there is
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best cutting board there is. In my opinion, don't even consider ordering anything else because this cutting board IS the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial piece of wood. I love it. Maybe I'll learn to cook now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Willis

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice product. My husband is a picky person who ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product. My husband is a picky person who never feels satisfied with any thing. He carefully chose this chopping board and live with it happily ever after.
customer_reviews.author: Hao W.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I washed it and it’s hideous! It lost all the color!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed not only the beautiful aesthetic of this cutting block, but also feel it can most definitely take a beating. The durability of it combined with appeal of the high end wood quality makes this a joy to have in the kitchen, will likley gift one to my friend this Christmas as she is a food blogger.
customer_reviews.author: rachael wagner

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had the cutting board for two months and already has multiple slips. I had been diligent in drying and piling but has not made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the packing of this product was fantastic. As soon as you open the box, you knew you were getting quality. Once opened, the look of the cutting board was amazing! It is definitely a piece you can leave out on the counter as a piece of decor and use as your everyday cutting board. Overall, a wonderful product. I hope Hardwood Chef continues to produce wonderful new styles of wooden kitchenware like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Webster

customer_reviews.title: Quality Butcher Block
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cutting board! Exactly what I expected! Only used it a few times but it’s quickly becoming my new favorite thing to use in the kitchen. Very durable. The quality is great and looks wonderful. I would recommend as a gift to anyone who likes cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Al Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worst. Broke in half 2nd day of use. Couldn’t stand up to Casual use. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Look beautiful as natural wood cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Look beautiful as natural wood cutting boards. Bought two for Christmas gifts for my children and their families so they won't be used until after then.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely breathtaking!
customer_reviews.text: I received the cutting board today and was so surprised to see how tightly secured it was. When I opened the box I was not expecting to find it so beautifully wraped. The cutting board itself is exceptionally designed. It looks beautiful in my kitchen and I'm looking forward to using it while entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: danielle demeo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has multiple uses; as a cutting board, food platter, and serving tray. The built-in handles complement it very well and provide for ease of use. Overall, the board looks stunning and presents very nicely. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a beneficial additional to their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: No Go!
customer_reviews.text: I have not even used this cutting board, and as you can see from pictures, it’s cracking. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Having used it yet but it feels sturdy and looks very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Having used it yet but it feels sturdy and looks very beautiful! It's slightly smaller than our original cutting board, but I don't think that will be a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said it was perfect. Great quality and affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He said it was perfect. Great quality and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Hand

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing product! Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing product! Solid quality, made with passion and soul. Make sure you season it well with mineral oil before first use. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sanmarconian

customer_reviews.title: Really great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I’ve used it several times and it still looks brandnew. I love the type of wood, the color and it’s durability. I highly recommend it and will probably get their other products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hamati

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this in my kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after first use (rinsed and dried properly). I should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and should hold up to daily use
customer_reviews.text: I have blown through so many cheap cutting boards I needed something new. This cutting board is exactly what I was looking for. It's beautiful and should hold up to daily use. The creators really care about the fine details too, even the packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M.

customer_reviews.title: Leave it on display
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cutting board and a fine centerpiece, need not put it away leave it on display. The thickness makes it stable and the large cutting surface is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really beautiful cutting/serving board
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful cutting/serving board. Very functional and a real pleasure to cut on. I've owned many other cutting boards of various materials and this one is head and shoulders above the rest. I'm looking forward to many years happy cutting.
customer_reviews.author: john j. sundermann

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! It's got excellent bounce
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It's got excellent bounce, heals quickly and doesn't dull my knives. Couple the functionality with the styling and you can't beat it. Way to go hardwood chef!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my brother-in-law as a Christmas gift and they loved it. It's a beautiful board and the handles on the side were a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Kamo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This board is beautiful, functional, and easy to handle and maintain. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Toboldi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board and very responsive company! They immediately sent an e-Book for cleaning/care. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melindakaren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: From the time I saw it on Instagram I decided I was going to get it. I saw many after that, but I felt that this board was going to be the right choice. I just got it and it's lived up to what I expected from it. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamale Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Really stands out if you use it to serve cheeses, salami, and crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Avila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's a well crafted. It will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just renovated my kitchen and needed a new cutting board for my Wusthof knife block. The board looks great, and haven’t had any issues with my blades. Also looks pretty sharp against granite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Functional and beautiful. Hardwood Chef is a luxury brand. If you want to be the best, you need to use the best. My second purchase, looking forward to buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is a beautiful board and works well as a kind of serving tray, too, for cut vegetables or fresh bread. Excellent customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: RKB

customer_reviews.title: WOWZER!
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many compliments on this cutting block. It is so beautiful and the way that it came packaged is so professional and appealing! I am going to purchase several more cutting blocks as Christmas gifts to my children. After all they are the ones that complimented! How could I not!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looks good out of the box. I'm seasoning mine before use with oil and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful serving tray
customer_reviews.text: Love my new serving tray! It is stunning! Beautifully made and sturdy. I first bought this to use mainly as a serving tray but now I am using it as my everyday cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: happybunny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! The wood is so pretty that I did not want to use it at first. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Hardwood Chef butcher block cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Hardwood Chef butcher block cutting board. It was packaged very nicely. I placed it on my countertop & it looks great in my kitchen. Excellent quality. I highly recommend this very useful & beautiful product. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the quality of this product. The wood is beautiful and the handles on the side make it a great serving piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very dry and needed conditioned decent block so far
customer_reviews.author: Bfutkos

customer_reviews.title: Quakity Product
customer_reviews.text: Great presentation! Arrived quickly via Amazon Prime and we luv it! Beautiful on our counter. Vaughan
customer_reviews.author: W. Vaughan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Splitting seams
customer_reviews.text: This product started splitting at the seams even with only hand washing and using block oil.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rudewicz

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: We got this board to set on our new granite counter-top. It's beautiful the way the grains of the wood flow with each other. The end handles are nice and deep, so there is no chance of your fingers slipping out and the juice grove makes it perfect! At first I thought it might be a little smaller than what I wanted, but now that it 's on the counter it's a actually a great size. I put some felt pads on the bottom so it would lift it up a bit and water wouldn't be able to get underneath and sit on the wood bottom. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it was amazing !! a great gift for the chef's in your family. You will not be disappointed! The packaging was beautiful . The quality of the wood "Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle jones

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It can be used for multiple purposes and looks great in any kitchen! Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both the beauty and performance of this product make it the nicest cutting board i have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, not too heavy to move around the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Beauty meets function. Good sized board that is not too heavy to handle. Besides the drip grooves, the grooves to grip the board are deep enough for safe handling. Very happy with purchase. First thing tho I am going to do is give this board a good oiling to protect the wood. As shipped, it feels very raw. A raw beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: We love the premium quality
customer_reviews.text: We love the premium quality. Ordered 2 more as gifts, and our recipients also love them. Both sides are finished and you can use one side for cutting and the other side for serving. The multi-coloring of the wood makes it display quite nicely and it can compliment any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This cutting board is extremely elegant and made me put ...
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is extremely elegant and made me put my other boards away permanently. It appears the seller is committed to excellence and has achieved the highest standard. Would definitely purchase again. Packaging matches the quality of such a board and was much more than expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within first month
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but cutting board developed multiple cracks after 2 weeks of moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Bombay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the wood was poor. Came out very dark and unlike the pictures. Essentially felt very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: AdeM

customer_reviews.title: Over the top!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered four for Christmas gifts, boxed so beautifully, with twine, butcher paper, care info card, plenty of foam protection on corners, in a box ready to put Christmas wrap on, or give as is! Very, very nice! Can't wait for everyone to open! Love the attention to detail, as well as prompt communication regarding my order.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine L. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: I went agaisnt the negative reviews and bought anyways. Super upset.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, I used this board Maybe 3 times. Never dropped it, never got it wet (wiped with a damp cloth to wash) and I noticed this morning it is cracking in two locations. I got this for a Christmas gift, so it was quite a letdown. With all the good reviews, I guess I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris De Sha

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: $80 cutting board.. arrives cracked. Generally I wouldn't care and would just glue it.. but come on. $80?
customer_reviews.author: Christian Michel

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product as a gift for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift for my husband for Christmas, but it was only after we had already thrown out the box that we found that the board was split all around. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New fan of Hardwood Chef
customer_reviews.text: Good bit of research went into finding the right board, and learning about end grain VS edge grain, After being used for over a month, I can attest that the cutting knives stay sharp, the board is free of cutting marks, and it's a pleasure to work with. The board was seasoned with food mineral oil several times before its initial use. - The presentation of the packaging is top notch! The board is beautiful!! - One side has a grooved border to catch liquid, the other side is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ziesler

customer_reviews.title: Is good acacia wood cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Is good acacia wood cutting board. For cut vegetables meats and poultry. Is not good for use a Cleaver to chop hard on this board. Is a simple wood cutting board, to use light cut of meat and vegetables. I like it a lot. I'm a Professional Chef, and I use it for my regular cutting vegetables and poultry. Can be used it for serving platter too. Is Beautifull and I love it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: danesa

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle weekly cleaver work.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this board for a year and a half, and have used both sides of it. It is a nice board to cut on, but it did not hold up to the once a week cleaver work I need it for. I have to portion a few pounds of chicken wings a week, and this board splintered. I kept it clean and conditioned, but it just couldn't handle the cleaver. The search for a cleaver proof board continues...
customer_reviews.author: JillyB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a good butcher block forever. This is so beautiful & wonderfully made. I oiled it up well & let it sit overnight. The next morning I waxed it up with Clark's Cutting Board Finishing Wax (which I loved). It looks SO beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mendez

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: This is a super-strong and beautiful cutting board. I may have been on a pink cloud caused by using a new purchase for the first time, but I swear my knives seemed sharper while I was using my new cutting board to prepare fruit salad. I look forward to using this board for decades to come and appreciate the care instructions to make it last. A great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Hanigan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new butcher block cutting board. It is extremely well made and is beautiful in color and appearance. I have no hesitation leaving it out on my kitchen island, as it looks nice on display. The information and booklet provided helped me understand the best way to treat and care for my new board so I can keep it both beautiful and functional for years to come. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE USEFUL CUTTING BOARD
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several different cutting boards in the past few months. It's interesting seeing the different woods, textures an designs. Like the height of this board. The handles have a large space easy to use to turn over an the surface is well planed so there aren't nicks or spaces. Easy to keep the surface prestige
customer_reviews.author: Teacup

customer_reviews.title: It broke in 1 fall in 1 week. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Here you go folks not the cutting board you want. The item fell from the kitchen closet and slammed onto hardwood floors. The block is shattered gone.
customer_reviews.author: WiiCube

customer_reviews.title: Made well and great packaging - ready to impress friends.
customer_reviews.text: Being someone that loves receiving packages on my doorstep, this was the ultimate surprise. From the moment I opened the box, the thought out packaging with the bow tie string, to the easy institutions included, then the real pleasure of the beautiful product. Made well, beautiful and functioning are only the beginning. I'm having a girls night at my house and looking forward to showing it off.
customer_reviews.author: Laurine Payne

product_meta.title: Hardwood Chef Premium Thick Acacia Wood End Grain Cutting Board Butcher Block with Groove, 16 x 12 x 1 3/4 in | For Chopping & Serving Cheese | (Gift Box Included) with BONUS e-Book
feature_bullets: ★ EXTRA-THICK & DURABLE: Nearly 2 inches thick to provide the ultimate in quality & durability. Built extremely solid with inner handles for portable safe carrying. Non-slip finish with safe and easy cleaning and care. Will not warp over time like inferior cutting boards and won't damage your expensive knives.

★ DEEP JUICE GROOVES: Large lip drip catcher for excess liquid during food prep-no need to worry about juices running off the board and onto your countertop when cooking and cutting up fruits, vegetables, and meats. Incredible tool to make gourmet dining healthy and homemade either in the house or outdoors.

★ EYE CATCHING DESIGN: Constructed of eco friendly sustainable acacia wood, which is used in many luxury wooden items due to its natural deep shimmering hues and unique pattern. This board is anything but bland!

★ BEAUTIFULLY WRAPPED: Comes wrapped in butcher paper with string tied on both sides. This end grain board is a delight to open, and makes an attractive & practical gift for weddings, holidays, charcuterie, housewarmings, birthdays, engagement parties, parent's anniversary or other special days!

★ STOP SETTLING FOR LESS! Perfect for carving grilled brisket, beef, pork, ribs, or turkey at barbecues. Incredible for fresh organic green vegetable platters with brie, dip, cheddar, and prosciutto to serve with wine before dinner.
